column2: Various professionals are required with varying skills and experience as given below. The skills may range from client side programming and graphics to server side management. A minimum of one year's hands- on experience in Web- related work is compulsory for all positions. Please specify skills available and indicate which of these skills you possess - and in what measure..  ??BEs/ MCAs/ graduates with diplomas in software engineering / computer science or equivalent education - with specific focus on Web / e- com tools  ??Possess sound knowledge and experience of Web design and development, e- Commerce components  ??Capable of independently developing highly functional corporate Sites  ??Seniors must be thorough at Web- server management, preferably on LINUX / ASP, MTS, JSP, JDBC, Java Servlets  ??Proven experience of scripting languages like HTML, DHTML, CGI scripts, JavaScript, Perl, PHP  ??Good experience of back- end tools like Oracle and SQL server  ??Have relevant experience in Web Designing / Web Administration / Web Server [ IIS / NT ]  ??Website registration  ??,270617500556.0,2017-06-27,2017-09-25,EducationalOccupationalCredential,24.0,Engineering - Software & QA,Back End Developer,Recruitment / Staffing,Graphics
